TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Zayazayan, title = Zayazayan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zayazayan} }

S.FORM: Zayazayan Itiniay i Majia Cen no Pingtung ko Zayazayan a niyaro', 233 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 793 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 768 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 25 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan89%, Rukai3%, Tayal1%, Amis1%, Bunun1%, roma2%.

Zayazayan Itiniay i Majia Cen no Pingtong ko Zayazayan a niyaro', 233 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 793 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 768 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 25 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan89%, Rokai3%, Tayal1%, Amis1%, Bonon1%, roma2%.
